title: How separating logic and search boosts AI agent scalability
summary: Separating logic from inference improves AI agent scalability by decoupling core workflows from execution strategies. The transition from generative AI prototypes to production-grade agents introduces a specific engineering hurdle: reliability. LLMs are stochastic by nature.
